A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: To start off\, I'm not a Star Wars fanatic by any stretch\, but I can appreciate the movies I'll also state that Rogue One is probably my favorite SW Universe film. Summary: Great visuals\, weak and lazy story full of cheap events to further the plot to the next mechanically scripted scene. The saving grace of this movie was the spectacular visual effects\, BB-8\, the music similar to the cantina theme from the original trilogy\, the ice foxes and the cute little bird creatures. I'm obviously trying not to spoil anything for those wishing to experience this watered down continuation of the series. I can understand where this movie comes from due to its mediocre predecessor\, Episode VII. And really\, JJ? Red ground? Like red matter in Alias and Star Trek (2009)? Worth seeing once; not a later purchase.
